title: Gasoline Savings Switching to Hybrid Car

content.question: An individual has been driving a passenger vehicle to work, averaging <math alttext="60" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>60</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> miles a week in a car that averages <math alttext="22" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>22</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> miles per gallon. The individual plans to purchase a hybrid vehicle that averages <math alttext="50" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> miles per gallon. If the individual drives to work <math alttext="50" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>50</mn></mrow></mstyle></math> weeks a year, how much gas will they save if they switch to a hybrid vehicle for their commute?

skill.text: Skill 6.C: Calculate an accurate numeric answer with appropriate units.
